=Introduction=

Tools that use the HTTP based API (e.g. notifier tools for various platforms) for *PRTG version 8 or later*.

_For PRTG version 7 take a look at [http://code.google.com/p/prtg7addons/wiki/VersionHistory this] page_.


Currently available tools from:

 * [PTF_Tools PRTG Tools Family]
